errors.notFoundDescription: Oops! The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved. Check the URL or go back home.
errors.errorDescription: We encountered an unexpected error while processing your request. Our engineers have been notified.

register.title: Get started absolutely free
register.subtitle: Already have an account?
register.terms: I agree to Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
register.success: Account created! Please check your email to verify.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.description: Please enter the email address associated with your account and we'll email you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.successDescription: We've sent a confirmation email to {email}. Please check your email.

Users.title: All Users
Users.inviteDescription: Send an invitation to a new team member.

table.confirmDeleteDesc: Are you sure you want to delete user <bold>{name}</bold>? This action cannot be undone.

general.title: General Settings
general.description: Configure the general information for your platform.

branding.title: Branding
branding.description: Customize the look and feel of your SaaS.

seo.title: Public SEO Configuration
seo.description: Configure Global SEO settings for your public pages (OG Image, Twitter).

Settings.title: Settings
Settings.subtitle: Manage system settings and personalize your experience

security.title: Security
security.2faDescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Manage how and when you receive notifications
notifications.newUsersDesc: Receive an email when a new user signs up
notifications.newOrdersDesc: Receive an email when a new order is placed
notifications.systemUpdatesDesc: Receive emails about updates and maintenance

AuditLogs.title: Audit Logs
AuditLogs.description: Complete history of critical system actions
AuditLogs.sectionDescription: Tracking of all administrative actions and system changes

Observability.title: Observability
Observability.description: Advanced monitoring based on Prometheus/Grafana patterns

goldenSignals.title: Golden Signals
goldenSignals.latencyTooltip: Request response time. 95% of requests are answered in this time or less. Ideal: < 200ms
goldenSignals.trafficTooltip: Number of requests per second the system is processing. Indicates current load
goldenSignals.errorsTooltip: Percentage of failed requests. Ideal: < 1%. High values indicate problems
goldenSignals.saturationTooltip: Resource usage (CPU/Memory). High values (>80%) indicate system overload

nodejsMetrics.title: Node.js Metrics
nodejsMetrics.eventLoopLagTooltip: Delay in event processing. Ideal: < 10ms. High values indicate server slowness
nodejsMetrics.memoryHeapTooltip: Memory used by Node.js application. If close to limit, may cause slowness
nodejsMetrics.activeHandlesTooltip: Open connections (files, sockets). Many handles may indicate resource leak
nodejsMetrics.activeRequestsTooltip: Number of requests being processed now. Very high values indicate overload

hardware.title: Hardware Metrics
hardware.description: Server CPU, memory, disk and network
hardware.cpuTooltip: Server processing. Ideal: < 70%. High values (>90%) indicate server overload
hardware.memoryTooltip: Server memory. Ideal: < 80%. If full, system may slow down or crash
hardware.diskTooltip: Disk space. Ideal: < 80%. If full, system stops working
hardware.uptimeTooltip: How long the server has been running without restart. High values are good (indicates stability)
hardware.temperatureTooltip: Processor temperature. Ideal: < 70°C. High temperatures (>85°C) may cause shutdown
hardware.swapTooltip: Virtual memory (disk used as RAM). Ideal: 0%. High usage indicates RAM shortage
hardware.diskIOTooltip: Disk read/write speed. High values are good

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure Services
infrastructure.description: Database, Cache and internal services status
infrastructure.latencyTooltip: Service response time. Ideal: < 50ms. High values indicate slowness
infrastructure.successRateTooltip: Percentage of successful operations. Ideal: > 99%. Low values indicate problems

externalAPIs.title: External APIs
externalAPIs.description: Third-party integrations status (Stripe, Google Maps, PagBit)
externalAPIs.latencyTooltip: External API response time. Depends on internet and service
externalAPIs.successRateTooltip: Percentage of successful calls. Low values may indicate API or internet problems
externalAPIs.notConfiguredTooltip: This API is not configured. Add the API key in environment variables

protection.title: Protection Systems
protection.description: Cache and Rate Limiting to protect the system
protection.cacheHitRateTooltip: Percentage of data found in cache (without database query). Ideal: > 80%. High values = faster system
protection.cacheMissRateTooltip: Percentage of data NOT found in cache. Ideal: < 20%. High values = slower system
protection.rateLimitViolationsTooltip: Number of requests blocked for excess. Protects against attacks and overload
protection.ttlTooltip: Time data stays in cache before expiring. Higher values = fewer database queries
protection.strategyTooltip: LRU = Removes least recently used items. Optimizes memory usage
protection.topViolatorsTooltip: IPs that most violated rate limit. May indicate attack attempts

diagnostics.title: Diagnostic Tools
diagnostics.activeSessionsTooltip: Monitoring sessions in progress. Collect metrics at regular intervals
diagnostics.completedSessionsTooltip: Finished monitoring sessions. Data saved for analysis
diagnostics.avgDurationTooltip: Standard time for each monitoring session
diagnostics.continuousMonitoringDesc: Start a session to collect metrics at regular intervals
diagnostics.durationTooltip: How long monitoring will collect data. Minimum: 1min, Maximum: 60min
diagnostics.forceRefreshTooltip: Updates all metrics immediately, without waiting for automatic interval
diagnostics.connectivityStatusDesc: Tests connection to all services (database, cache, external APIs)

alerts.noActiveAlerts: No active alerts. System is healthy!
alerts.thresholdsTooltip: When a metric exceeds these limits, an alert is automatically generated
alerts.resolveTooltip: Marks this alert as resolved. It will be removed from active alerts list

Maintenance.title: Under Maintenance
Maintenance.description: We're currently performing scheduled maintenance to improve our services. We'll be back shortly.

ComingSoon.title: Coming Soon
ComingSoon.subtitle: We're building something extraordinary. This feature will be available on your dashboard soon.

notify.label: Notify me at launch
notify.disclaimer: * We promise not to spam. Only important product updates.
